Body:
text = get_long_text()
template = Template(background=PIL.Image.new(mode='RGB', size=SIZE, color=
    'white'), left_margin=3, top_margin=6, right_margin=3, bottom_margin=6,
    line_spacing=2, font=get_default_font(), font_size=2)
images1 = handwrite(text, template, seed=SEED)
images2 = handwrite(text, (template,), seed=SEED)
assert list(images1) == list(images2)
